commands_catalog.command:
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:blue/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:blue/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:green/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:green/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:red/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:red/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/status\:red/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/status\:red/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/status\:blue/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/status\:blue/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/status\:green/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/status\:green/brightness

systemctl stop pu_resetBtn_monitor.service
touch /tmp/MFG
/usr/sbin/pu_resetBtn_monitor &

cat /tmp/reset_button
按下Reset button 10 秒後放開
commands_catalog.example:
Pressed RESET button over 10 seconds, do factory default action!
cat /tmp/reset_button    Get 1 or 0

commands_catalog.command:
rm -f /tmp/MFG
systemctl restart pu_resetBtn_monitor.service
按下Reset button 10 秒後放開

commands_catalog.description:
Get firmware boot version

Speaker Frequency Response
Speaker THD

commands_catalog.command:
diag -g temp s0
diag -g temp s1
diag -g temp s2
diag -g temp s3
diag -g temp bat

diag -g status sd
mount |grep sd
echo "1234" > /mnt/sd/test_sd
cat /mnt/sd/test_sd

*install battery first
diag -g temp bat 
diag -g voltage bat
diag -g bat percent
diag -g current bat
diag -g capacity
diag -g voltage design
diag -g current design
diag -g current batNoPoE
commands_catalog.description:
Temperature
Get battery voltage
Get battery percentage
Charging STATUS
Discharging STATUS

NA
NA
diag -g status charger
diag -g charger acok
diag -g voltage charger
diag -g current charger
NA
NA
diag -g charger start_perc
diag -g charger stop_perc
commands_catalog.description:
Set charger ON
Set charger OFF
Get Charge status charge/dischage

Set/Get chaarger start/stop percentage (this function will be disabled if  input command "diag -s charger on" or "diag -s charger off". Power recycles can be recoverd)
